ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL,'B3',?,?,?)
INSERT INTO RECIPE(ORDER_NO, BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, RECIPE_CONTENT) VALUES(?,SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL,'B3',?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, REF_CODE, REF_CNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL,'B3',?,?,?,'/resources/image/recipeImg/')
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, REF_CODE, REF_CNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL,SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL,'B3',?,?,?,'/resources/image/recipeImg/')
INSERT INTO RECIPE_INGRD(INGRD_CODE, BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, DOSE, DOSE_CODE) VALUES(?,SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL,'B3',?,?)
SELECT FILE_NO , REF_CNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS LIKE 'Y' AND REF_CODE LIKE ? AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY FILE_NO
SELECT ORDER_NO, RECIPE_CONTENT FROM RECIPE WHERE BOARD_CODE LIKE ? AND BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO
SELECT DOSE , INGRD_NAME, DOSE_NAME FROM RECIPE_INGRD JOIN INGRD USING(INGRD_CODE) JOIN DOSE_UNIT USING(DOSE_CODE) WHERE BOARD_CODE LIKE ? AND BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , BT.BOARD_KOR_NAME , M.MEMBER_ID, BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , VIEWS , LIKES , CREATED_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER=M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE BT ON(BT.BOARD_CODE = B.BOARD_CODE) WHERE B.BOARD_CODE LIKE ? AND B.BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS LIKE 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, VIEWS, LIKES, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG", B.CREATED_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON(B.BOARD_NO = A.REF_BNO) WHERE B.BOARD_CODE = 'B3' AND A.REF_CNO = 0 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM') = TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YY/MM') ORDER BY LIKES DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
